title: I need to know
body: anyone know what happens if I get an S rank when I get a champ to level 5? because I have been grinding {{champion:53}} lvls and I have gotten an S rank on almost everyone and was wondering, so please tell me, thank you.

replies.body: If you got an S on a champion but didn't get any [**mastery tokens**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284), it's likely because you don't actually own that champ yet. You also have to be playing on SR Normal or Ranked games in order to get tokens.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZnEAOVyO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-30T03:45:47.054+0000)
>
> If you got an S on a champion but didn't get any [**mastery tokens**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284), it's likely because you don't actually own that champ yet. You also have to be playing on SR Normal or Ranked games in order to get tokens.

I meant like if I level up a champ I own and get an S would I get a token?

At mastery level 5, you'll need to get S-,S, or S+ to get those tokens. Once you get 2 mastery tokens, you can combine them with their champions hextech shard to level them up to level 6. The same applies for getting to level 7, but you'll need to get 3 tokens by getting S or S+ scores.
